summary: Celebrimbor is a character from J.R.R. Tolkien's stories. He was an elf who made powerful rings, tricked by the bad guy Sauron. Sauron wanted to control everything with a special ring. This ring started the big events in "The Lord of the Rings." Tolkien got the idea from an old inscription about a ring. Celebrimbor is also in a video game and a TV show.
title: Celebrimbor
